name: Shark's Day Out
description:
You are Shark the dog! Shark loves to collect bones of all sizes. Big bones or small bones, it doesn't matter! Help Shark collect as many bones as you can, but watch out! There are many scary things out there, especially at night! 

Project status

We ran out of time when making this game as a part of a Game Jam. In it's current state, you can run around and collect objects and defeat enemies.

  • There is currently no audio in the game
  • There is currently only one level in the game
  • UI for health, number of coins collected, etc.
  • Several features that didn't make it  😂
Controls

Keyboard and Gamepad are supported, however Gamepad has not been tested.

  • WASD or arrow keys to move around
  • Spacebar to jump
Credits

This game was made as part of the Game Jam Aotearoa 2022. The following people helped make this game:

  • Programming and Unity development: Jeff "Peabnuts123" Andrews
  • Lead Artist: Madison Webb
  • Art and Design: Rachel Lynch
  • Additional Art: Ryan
